name: bacon pope
text: They were out of potato wedges, but were still great.

name: Daren Koenck
text: Huge improvement!  We haven't been to Godfather's in a few months, but went last weekend.  We ordered a large original taco pizza and breadsticks.  The breadsticks came out within 10 minutes, hot and fresh!  The pizza followed about 10 …More

name: Paige Grove
text: Got a thin crust pizza with bell peppers onions and tomatoes got an all meat “deluxe no mushrooms no olives “ it also didn’t have bell pepper onions or tomatoes . Also the breads sticks I ordered were doughy .when I called to late them know …More

name: Y2KDEAN
text: Simply put "Amazing"

name: Clint Summers
text: New management has taken over the estherville godfathers. Great service and excellent food. Buffet in the past has had problems but this is no more! Come in and see for yourself.

name: larry ackerman
text: We got there right before closing and the food and service was great..

name: Kyle Dalton
text: To start off I love the food here, but what makes everything better is the crew that is working here. In my past visit every single crew member had a smile on there face even though it was fairly busy when I was in. I also love the Buffet …More

name: Shawn Lohman
text: Very poor lunch buffet. Sat there for 40 minutes 11:30 to 12:10 and not one fresh pizza and I had cold potato wedges. One star is to good for this visit.

name: WESTON LONG
text: Service was bad. The chicken was undercooked. They were out of potatoes for an hour. The chicken was cold. Never going there again. The pizza was very cold

name: Kyla Hansen
text: Godfathers in Estherville is amazing. They make amazing pizzas, chicken, etc. I would definitely recommend!

name: Laurie Caswell
text: If I had to base it on today's experience I'd never go back but this place has always been a go to when visiting Estherville for 30+ yrs... Hope our next visit is much better. We got the buffet 45 mins before it ended, was empty of choices, lettuce was wilted nothing was added in 45 mins so we got our money back...

name: Stacey Cooklin Montgomery
text: Buffet is typically not that great but the pizza is really good when you order a fresh pizza.

name: Tyler Allen
text: Always come for the buffet. There is no cheese on the salad bar. There are not many choices and the staff doesn't come around and get your plates till you are gone. I would not recommend it unless someone else is paying for it.

name: Laura Haegeman
text: Something was put in our food my daughter and i were seeing things shortly after leaving will never ever eat there again. Only thing we ate the same that whole day was their cheese breadsticks No employee was over age 21 and the person i talked to about what happened hung up on me!

name: Christian Sjourney
text: Got a burnt thin crust pizza delivered and called to report it.   The store said it would send out a free one next time to replace it.  About 10 days later we ordered the free replacement but the store said there would  be another $2 …More

name: John Witzke
text: Under new management, The Estherville Godfathers strives to give you not only the best service and product, but the hometown feel you love!

name: Staci Wedeking
text: The godfather's pizza over in estherville,IA taste yuke. So I wouldn't go over to estherville,IA godfather's pizza at all.

name: alzeppelin
text: Only reason they get one star is because a zero isn't available.  Most pathetic excuse for a buffet I have ever seen.   You are lucky to see one new pizza put in the tiny warming area every hour.  Plenty of workers standing around though.

name: Katrina Lutzow
text: This was a horrible experience! The buffet was almost empty, and the food that was there was so hard, my son and I could hammer it on the table without it crumbling or breaking. Also, the tables were dirty, the staff was rude to a small child and his father who were there together. Awful!

name: Kelly Wickman
text: I would technically give it 0 stars! Nothing on Buffett, employees are clueless when asked questions and they ran out of ingredients to make pizzas. Every table was dirty. Never eating here again.

name: Stephanie Menneke
text: I had to go ask for my mini pizza after I waited for 25 minutes. Lot's of associates had time to be on their phones and stand in groups at the counter to chat but my pizza was sitting in a box for some unknown reason for five minutes . I …More

name: Charlie Anderson
text: Best wings around! We drive 20 miles one way just to have them.

name: Bernad Swingen
text: Good pizza and service

name: Mike Thompson
text: Bacon cheese burger was just a hamburger. No pickels. Normal we drive out of are way but know i will have to think twice.

name: Paul Yeisley
text: Good affordable lunch buffet in a small town, but sweet tea came out as water and unsweetened tea was close to that. 4 stars for food though

name: ann coffman
text: They stopped refilling the buffet early so we only had couple of old pizzas to choose from. The salad bar was tiny, almost no real veggies, some premade stuff like macaroni salad. LOTS of dirty tables too

name: Ruth Albrant
text: The Food is Always Good and there's a Great buffet with lots of choice! Plus Sr. Citizens Discount!

name: Jeffery Minton
text: Buffet?  Not so much!  Full restaurant and nearly empty warming tables do not a buffet make.  No chicken for the first 15 minutes,  then they bring out 7 pieces,  gone in a New York minute!  Employees spent far more time socializing than …More

name: Cody Strayer
text: It sucked.they had dirty dishes up in the clean dishes .I'm sorry but u shouldn't have to worry about weather ur plate is clean when u go to grab it .I pulled out 2dirty dishes and then didn't want anything else

name: Mike Peterson
text: They have good pizza, check the specials!

name: Mike Eggers
text: Never pizza on Buffet!!  If there is it's not good pizza!!

name: Tony Hughes
text: Good pizza!

name: Scott Goecke
text: Very poor service had to wait over 45  minutes to get our food and they still got our order wrong

name: Connie Dudolski
text: Good pizza.

name: Tanya Veen
text: Absolutely horrible!!! There was no food on the buffet. Came hungry and left hungry!

name: Tim Koen
text: Has really good food!

name: John Miller
text: Good pizza

name: James Cohan
text: Not open long for supper

name: Elinor Paulson
text: Good food

name: Elias Escribano
text:
